video.title: The Numbers Game
video.synopsis: Data scientist and host Jake Porway explores how everyday people can use data to enrich their lives -- and even lengthen them.

episodes.synopsis: What does it take to become a hero? Jake examines the question scientifically and comes up with some surprising answers.
episodes.title: Could You Be a Hero?

episodes.synopsis: In honor of April Fools' Day, Jake shares methods for spotting a scam and examines the unexpected benefits of being gullible.
episodes.title: Are You a Sucker?

episodes.synopsis: Jake crunches the numbers on attractiveness to find that beauty isn't just skin-deep: Being more attractive can make us happier, healthier and richer.
episodes.title: Are You Desirable?

episodes.synopsis: Nice guys may finish last, but Jake's data indicates that it's more about bad guys finishing first: being disagreeable can be a way of getting ahead.
episodes.title: Are You a Jerk?

episodes.synopsis: Jake crunches the numbers on lying to discover that fibs and fabrications are much more common than we think, then reveals how to spot a lie.
episodes.title: Are You a Big Liar?

episodes.synopsis: Jake flexes his mental muscles during an investigation of toughness. Just what is this elusive quality, and what determines who's tough and who's not?
episodes.title: How Tough Are You?

episodes.synopsis: Data scientist Jake Porway breaks down the qualities of effective bosses, how to build an optimal team and how to successfully reach goals.
episodes.title: Could You Be the Boss?

episodes.synopsis: Examining the science behind superstitions, Jake learns that in some circumstances, luck-based thinking can actually boost human self-confidence.
episodes.title: Are You Superstitious?

episodes.synopsis: Jake analyzes the art and science of persuasion with those who consistently get what they want, from top salesmen to people who always win arguments.
episodes.title: Can You Get What You Want?

episodes.synopsis: Risk isn't all bungee jumping and skydiving. Jake examines the small ways we take risks every day, from dietary choices to financial investments.
episodes.title: Are You a Risk Taker?

episodes.synopsis: Armageddon, major blackouts and a zombie apocalypse are all survivable, for those armed with the illuminating data Jake uncovers in this episode.
episodes.title: Could You Survive a Zombie Apocalypse?

episodes.synopsis: Jake examines the science behind code breaking and how pattern-recognition skills can enhance daily life, from choosing passwords to texting.
episodes.title: Can Code Breaking Change Your Life?
